attributes.action: Allow Rick Astley to perform at the 2012 Olympic Games Opening Ceremony
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been alleged that the Department of Culture, Media and Sport have deemed Rick Astley as an unsuitable act for the opening of the 2012 Olympics because he is too British, and his dance routines are a little too risque for a family audience.

This is a ridiculous decision and should be overturned in the name of common sense and great entertainment.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
